meanings.definition: Not existing before; made, introduced, or discovered recently or now for the first time.
meanings.sent1: I got a new toy for my birthday.
meanings.sent2: The store just got new stock of shoes.
meanings.sent3: The new puppy chewed on my shoe.
meanings.sent4: Her new idea sparked a revolution in the company.
meanings.sent5: The new car smell was intoxicating.

meanings.definition: Different from one of the same category that has existed previously.
meanings.sent1: She bought a new dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: The new model of the phone has better features.
meanings.sent3: The new flavor of ice cream was surprisingly spicy.
meanings.sent4: His new approach to painting was avant-garde.
meanings.sent5: The new design of the building was futuristic.

meanings.sent1: The new species of bird was discovered in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The new recipe for cookies was a hit with the kids.
meanings.sent3: The new invention helped people communicate faster.
meanings.sent4: Her new song topped the charts within days.
meanings.sent5: The new discovery in science changed the way we view the world.
